style.name: wxCAL_SUNDAY_FIRST
style.description: Show Sunday as the first day in the week (not in wxGTK)

style.name: wxCAL_MONDAY_FIRST
style.description: Show Monday as the first day in the week (not in wxGTK)

style.name: wxCAL_SHOW_HOLIDAYS
style.description: Highlight holidays in the calendar (only generic)

style.name: wxCAL_NO_MONTH_CHANGE
style.description: Disable the month (and, implicitly, the year) changing

style.name: wxCAL_SHOW_SURROUNDING_WEEKS
style.description: Show the neighbouring weeks in the previous and next months (only generic, always on for the native controls)

style.name: wxCAL_SEQUENTIAL_MONTH_SELECTION
style.description: Use alternative, more compact, style for the month and year selection controls. (only generic)

style.name: wxCAL_SHOW_WEEK_NUMBERS
style.description: Show week numbers on the left side of the calendar. (not in generic)

event.name: EVT_CALENDAR
event.description: A day was double clicked in the calendar.

event.name: EVT_CALENDAR_WEEKDAY_CLICKED
event.description: User clicked on the week day header (only generic).

event.name: EVT_CALENDAR_WEEK_CLICKED
event.description: User clicked on the week of the year number (only generic).
